ygData.subject: Questions about the Water Crystal Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Do any of you know what MOB has the Water Crystal staff?  Or the Slime Crystal Staff? I have heard that the WCS is found in Lake Rathe on a level 20ish MOB...
ygData.messageBody:
Do any of you know what MOB has the Water Crystal staff? Or the Slime
Crystal Staff?

I have heard that the WCS is found in Lake Rathe on a level 20ish MOB... is
this correct? Does anyone have additional info like where he can be found?

I know nothing about the Slime Crystal Staff so any info you have would be
helpful.

I want to get a decent 1hd staff that looks interesting.

Are there any other different looking 1hd staff(or any good ones for that
matter) that a level 20 Necro (with some similar level friends if needed)
could obtain... not that I'm positive I could get either of these.

Yours in hate,
Azerin of Brell
